creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: color image of a newspaper clipping of a photograph of a sculpture of Eros sleeping on a stone on top of a book with an image of a black and white photograph of a sleeping child on a bed
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Bronze Baby and Julia from Joanne's "Being in Pictures"
